summary: Completed comprehensive testing of KSP Cricket website. All backend APIs working perfectly with live cricket data from cricketdata.org. Frontend displays live matches, navigation works smoothly, Telegram integration functional, and dark blue stadium theme properly applied.
passed_tests: Root API endpoint returns 'KSP Cricket API running'
Current matches endpoint returns 25 live matches
Match details page loads and navigation works
Telegram bot info returns correct username 'Ksplivescorebot'
Subscribe page loads with working Telegram widget
Dark blue stadium theme properly applied
Score cards display team names and scores correctly
No error messages found on frontend
success_percentage: Backend: 100% (10/10 tests passed), Frontend: 100% (11/11 tests passed)
